div.div:
important information to our students, parents and communities.
1. District website - www.coolidgeisd.org
2. Remind - See instructions below on how to join.
You can receive school messages to your phone and/or email.
3. Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Coolidgeisd/
Instructions to join Coolidge ISD Remind
1. Join by Text Message
text @coolidge to the number 81010
You will receive a welcome text from Remind.
If anyone has trouble with 81010, they can try texting @coolidge to (281) 712-6759.
2. Join by Link
https://www.remind.com/join/coolidge
